perksWithImages.name: Quick & Quiet
perksWithImages.description:
You do not make as much noise as others when quickly vaulting over obstacles or hiding in lockers.

The vault and hide actions' noise detection and audio range is reduced by {0}%.

This effect can only trigger once every {1} seconds.

perksWithImages.name: Low Profile
perksWithImages.description:
You work best alone. When it’s just you and your pursuer, you know how to disappear.

When you become the last Survivor standing, this perk activates. Hide your scratch marks, pools of blood and grunts of pain caused by injuries for {0} seconds.

perksWithImages.name: Surveillance
perksWithImages.description:
Unlocks potential in one's aura reading ability. Any regressing generator will be highlighted by a white aura. If the regression is interrupted on a generator, it will be highlighted by a yellow aura for {0} seconds.

Noises created by generator repairs are audible at an additional {1} meters.

perksWithImages.name: Tinkerer
perksWithImages.description:
Whenever a generator is repaired to {0}% progress, it triggers a loud noise notification and you are granted the Undetectable status effect for the next {2} seconds. This effect can only be triggered once on each generator.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.
